definition: A term referring to objects or items that are typically used to adorn and embellish indoor and outdoor spaces during a specific festive season, often associated with the end of the year. These decorative elements are commonly employed to create a joyful and celebratory atmosphere, particularly during a specific holiday period.

examples.english: The Christmas decoration hangs on the tree.

examples.german: Wir haben die Weihnachtsdekoration im Wohnzimmer aufgestellt.
examples.english: We have set up the Christmas decoration in the living room.

examples.german: Sie hat die Weihnachtsdekoration selbst gebastelt.
examples.english: She made the Christmas decoration herself.

examples.german: Die Weihnachtsdekoration verleiht dem Raum eine festliche Atmosphäre.
examples.english: The Christmas decoration gives the room a festive atmosphere.
